group_1.narration: One day, Kako sent me a message.@"Let's meet at the park like we always do."
I thought she and Felicia wanted to hang,@but then she asked me to bring Hazuki.
Even without my intuition, I could totally@tell that meant somethin' was up...

group_1.textRight: Whatever this is about...
It involves not just Ayame, but me as well?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...

group_1.textRight: So, um... W-watcha wanna talk to us@about?

group_1.textLeft: First, there's this strange thing that's@been happening in Kamihama...
We should explain that first.
Felicia, can you talk about that part?
Yeah, I got it!

group_1.textRight: Felicia knows about it too? Whatever@"it" is...

group_1.textLeft: No duh! I'm a mercenary, ya know.@I hear all kindsa tasty stuff.

group_1.textRight: So, what's going on?

group_1.textLeft: Magical Girls have been droppin' like flies@lately...

group_1.textRight: "Dropping"...?[chara:302701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]

group_1.textLeft: Uh, you know... Like...um...
Fainting...?
Yeah, [chara:100501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]that's the word! Fainting!
After you fight a Witch or a Familiar or@whatever...
All of a sudden, WHAMMO! Down you go!

group_1.textRight: So, like...why?

group_1.textLeft: Ain't got a clue. NO ONE has any idea why@they're passin' out.
It's not happenin' in a Labyrinth, so it's@not like a Witch is doin' it.
And sounds like there's no magical trace, @So it can't be a Witch.
Sooo, that means the suspects are...

group_1.textRight: Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: EXACTLY!
They say someone is using their magic to@make other girls faint...

group_1.textRight: Huh, huh, huh? Why would someone do a mean@thing like that?
There's no reason to go around makin' people@pass out!

group_1.textLeft: Well...there is some speculation on that.@Some people think...
"They must be knocking out other girls to@thin out the competition."

group_1.textRight: Wait, the ones who fainted, are they...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, they're still asleep. Or they are@according to the rumor, anyway.
I don't know anyone who's been affected,@so I don't know for sure if it's true...
But yeah, that rumor's got everyone in a@big panic.
Either that or they're SUPER cautious and on@edge, jumpin' at shadows...
Yes, there are way fewer Magical Girls@going out to hunt Witches, now...
That's why I barely get any work these@days... Ugh, it really ticks me off!

group_1.textRight: Ah... So that's why they think it's "to thin@out competition", huh...

group_1.textLeft: Yes. Which is why people suspect that the@culprit is a Magical Girl...

group_1.textRight: Well, who is it?! Who, who, who?! Who would@do somethin' like this?!
If I find 'em, I'll...I'll...[chara:302801:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]!

group_1.textLeft: But there's something even worse. There's@another rumor...
"The Magical Girls who've recently come @into Kamihama are suspicious"...

group_1.textRight: Ugh...
I can see where this is going...
What?! Tell me, tell me! What's it mean?
Basically...
They think we're the culprits. They're saying@we did it.
Whaaaaaat?!
Why, why, why?! Why would we ever do that?!

group_1.textLeft: I-I know you would never! You and your@friends aren't like that, Ayame...
Right?@Right, Felicia?!
Yeah... I can't really see Ayame bein' smart@enough to pull somethin' like that off.
She'd probably just sneak up behind ya,@then POW! Right in the back of the head.

group_1.textRight: Ngh! I...ergh...nngh!

group_1.textLeft: A-Ayame, your face turned bright red!

group_1.textRight: She wants to deny that description, but not@incriminate herself at the same time...
Seriously though, just like Ayame said.@We would never do anything like that.
Konoha wouldn't, either.

group_1.textLeft: Right!

group_1.textRight: But you know...all rumors like that have to@start somewhere.
We haven't dealt with other Magical Girls@aside from Nanaka Tokiwa.
I guess someone could've been spying on us@from somewhere...
But any Magical Girl could have started the@rumor.

group_1.textLeft: It's Nanaka for sure!
F-Felicia!

group_1.textRight: What?![chara:302801:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain] Really?!

group_1.textLeft: There's nothin' she wouldn't do! That's what@I think!
N-no, you're wrong! She wouldn't do that!
And what makes YOU so sure?!
Because...she said...!

group_1.textCenter: People think those three are the ones@behind the fainting?
I doubt that. You only need to meet@them once to tell.
They aren't weak enough that they'd need@to rely on such indirect tactics.
Rather, I feel someone is trying to@frame them...
Yes... Someone is plotting against them.

group_1.textLeft: That's what she said!

group_1.textRight: Huh... I'm not so sure!

group_1.textLeft: Oh come on, Felicia...

group_1.textRight: Whew...so she's given us a surprisingly@glowing review...

group_1.textLeft: But I'm still a little worried about what@she said.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, the idea that someone out there's@making us out to look guilty...
Wh-wh-who would DO that?! And whyyy?!

group_1.textLeft: I have no idea...
Yeah, and it's not like we know anyone who@can make people faint either.

group_1.textRight: Well, the bigger issue right now isn't who's@behind it... That's a concern for later.
Our main problem is that the blame is falling@on us, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it is...

group_1.textRight: If this rumor spreads much further it could@end up being a real pain in the butt...
People might even try to get back at us.
Gnnngghhhhhh...!
Why?! We've never done anythin' wrong!
All the same, thanks for telling us, Kako.

group_1.textLeft: No, it was the least I could do!

group_1.textRight: Oh, and thank you too, Felicia.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, no biggie!
Ayame! You go blow that stupid rumor away,@got it?!

group_1.textRight: Yeah! Leave it to me!

group_1.textCenter: (Now, how in the world do I explain all this@to Konoha...)
